verses.verse: Now the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> like those who <S%H596>complain<s%> of <S%H9563>adversity<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it,] His <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> among them and <S%H398>consumed<s%> [some] of the <S%H7097>outskirts<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
The <S%H5971>people<s%> therefore <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H8257>died<s%> out.
So the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8404>Taberah,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> among them.

And the <S%H628>rabble<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H7130>among<s%> them <S%H183>had<s%> <S%H8378>greedy<s%> <S%H183>desires<s%><S%H8378>;<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> will give us <S%H1320>meat<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>?

"We <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H1710>fish<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we used to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2600>free<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H7180>cucumbers<s%> and the <S%H20>melons<s%> and the <S%H2682>leeks<s%> and the <S%H1211>onions<s%> and the <S%H7762>garlic,<s%>

but <S%H6258>now<s%> our <S%H5315>appetite<s%> is <S%H3002>gone.<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> to <S%H5869>look<s%> at <S%H1115>except<s%> this <S%H4478>manna.<s%> "
Now the <S%H4478>manna<s%> was like <S%H1407>coriander<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and its <S%H5869>appearance<s%> like that of <S%H916>bdellium.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> would <S%H7751>go<s%> <S%H7751>about<s%> and <S%H3950>gather<s%> [it] and <S%H2912>grind<s%> [it] between two <S%H7347>millstones<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1743>beat<s%> [it] in the <S%H4085>mortar,<s%> and <S%H1310>boil<s%> [it] in the <S%H6517>pot<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> with it; and its <S%H2940>taste<s%> was as the <S%H2940>taste<s%> of <S%H3955>cakes<s%> <S%H3955>baked<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
And when the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H3381>fell<s%> on the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at <S%H3915>night,<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%> would <S%H3381>fall<s%> with it.

Now <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of his <S%H168>tent;<s%> and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7489>displeased.<s%> <S%H5869><s%>

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> hast Thou been so <S%H7489>hard<s%> on Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>? And <S%H4100>why<s%> have I not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> that Thou hast <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> on me?

"Was it I who <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>? Was it I who <S%H3205>brought<s%> them <S%H3205>forth,<s%> that Thou shouldest <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H5375>'Carry<s%> them in your <S%H2436>bosom<s%> as a <S%H539>nurse<s%> <S%H5375>carries<s%> a <S%H3243>nursing<s%> <S%H3243>infant,<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H7650>swear<s%> to their fathers'?

<S%H4480>"Where<s%> <S%H370><s%> am I to get <S%H1320>meat<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>? For they <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>'Give<s%> us <S%H1320>meat<s%> that we may <S%H398>eat!<s%>'
"I <S%H905>alone<s%> am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H3515>burdensome<s%> for me.

"So <S%H518>if<s%> Thou art going to <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H3602>thus<s%> with me, <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H2026>kill<s%> me at <S%H2026>once,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and do not let me <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H9567>wretchedness.<s%>"

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> therefore <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H622>"Gather<s%> for Me <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> to be the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> them to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and let them <S%H3320>take<s%> their <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with you.

"Then I will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you <S%H8033>there,<s%> and I will <S%H680>take<s%> of the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is upon you, and will <S%H7760>put<s%> [Him] upon them; and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> with you, so that you shall not <S%H5375>bear<s%> [it] all <S%H905>alone.<s%>

"And <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6942>'Consecrate<s%> yourselves for <S%H4279>tomorrow,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat;<s%> for you have <S%H1058>wept<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>"Oh<s%> that <S%H4310>someone<s%> would give us <S%H1320>meat<s%> to <S%H398>eat!<s%> For we were well-off in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> "Therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1320>meat<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat.<s%>

'You shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> two <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>

but a <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> it <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of your <S%H639>nostrils<s%> and <S%H1961>becomes<s%> <S%H2214>loathsome<s%> to you; <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> you have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you and have <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> did we <S%H2088>ever<s%> <S%H3318>leave<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?"' "

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I am, are 600000 on <S%H7273>foot;<s%> yet Thou hast <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H1320>meat<s%> in order that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> for a <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>'

"Should <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> be <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> for them, to be <S%H4672>sufficient<s%> for them? <S%H518>Or<s%> should <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> be <S%H622>gathered<s%> together for them, to be <S%H4672>sufficient<s%> for them?"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Is the Lord's <S%H3027>power<s%> <S%H9527>limited<s%>? <S%H6258>Now<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> whether My <S%H1697>word<s%> will <S%H7136>come<s%> <S%H7136>true<s%> for you <S%H518>or<s%> not."

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out and <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> Also, he <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5975>stationed<s%> them <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him; and He <S%H680>took<s%> of the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was upon him and <S%H5414>placed<s%> [Him] upon the <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2205>elders.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that when the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> upon them, they <S%H5012>prophesied.<s%> But they did not <S%H3254>do<s%> [it] <S%H3254>again.<s%>

But <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> had <S%H7604>remained<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H419>Eldad<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4312>Medad.<s%> And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> upon them (now they were among those who had been <S%H3789>registered,<s%> but had not <S%H3318>gone<s%> out to the <S%H168>tent<s%>), and they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

So a <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H419>"Eldad<s%> and <S%H4312>Medad<s%> are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>"

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H8334>attendant<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> from his <S%H979>youth,<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4872>"Moses,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H3607>restrain<s%> them."

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Are you <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for my sake? <S%H4310>Would<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> that the Lord would <S%H5414>put<s%> His <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> upon them!"
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H622>returned<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> [both] he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now there <S%H5265>went<s%> <S%H5265>forth<s%> a <S%H7307>wind<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and it <S%H1468>brought<s%> <S%H7958>quail<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and let [them] <S%H5203>fall<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> about a day's <S%H1870>journey<s%> on <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H3541>side<s%> and a day's <S%H1870>journey<s%> on the <S%H3541>other<s%> <S%H3541>side,<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and about two <S%H520>cubits<s%> [deep] on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6965>spent<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7958>quail<s%> (he who gathered <S%H4591>least<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H9149>homers<s%>) and they <S%H7849>spread<s%> [them] out for themselves <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

While the <S%H1320>meat<s%> was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> their <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> it was <S%H3772>chewed,<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>severe<s%> <S%H4347>plague.<s%>

So the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> Kibroth-hattaavah, <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H6912>buried<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who had <S%H183>been<s%> <S%H183>greedy.<s%>
From Kibroth-hattaavah the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out for <S%H2698>Hazeroth,<s%> and they <S%H1961>remained<s%> at <S%H2698>Hazeroth.<s%>
